_header: In time to come the wood shall want and water shall increase
Subjects: prophecies; prognostications; evils of the time
_description: Prophecy of evil times to come — one long couplet

HunRB34001.Transcription:
In tyme to come the wodde shall wante and water shall IncreaseAnd
                    vice shall steke from yonge and olde how vertue to release
HunRB34001.Note: Added by a hand of first half of the sixteenth century.
HunRB34001.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 257.
